content:
You have an Azure virtual machine
named VM1 that runs Windows
Server 2019.
You sign in to VM1 as a user named
User1 and perform the following
actions:
Create files on drive C.
Create files on drive D.
Modify the screen şaver timeout.
Change the desktop background
You plan to redeploy VM1
Which changes will be lost after you
redeploy VM1?
the modified screen saver timeout
the new desktop background
the new files on drive D
the new files on drive C
